headline: 1Kosmos CSO to Lead Expert Panel on Modernizing Identity Verification at 2025 Gartner IAM Summit
summary: Identity leaders from Disney, Lowe’s, Marriott and VF Corp will unpack lessons learned on hiring fraud, AI deepfakes and impersonation attacks, and how to stop themISELIN, N.J., Dec. 02, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- 1Kosmos, a leader in identity verification and passwordless authentication, today announced that its Chief Strategy Officer and former CISO at Lehman Brothers, Mike Engle, will moderate an expert panel discussion at the Gartner Identity & Access Management Summit 2025 titled Modernizing

headline: NAPA VALLEY MARRIOTT AND PREFERABLI ANNOUNCE PARTNERSHIP TO CREATE TRULY PERSONALIZED GUEST EXPERIENCES
summary: The Napa Valley Marriott Hotel & Spa and Preferabli, the leading AI-driven, B2B2C product and experience recommendation software, are excited to announce a partnership to create truly elevated hotel guest experiences. Napa Valley Marriott guests can now embark on personalized itineraries across the valley and get taste-based recommendations on property using the Tastefuli app by Preferabli.

headline: Waterford and Maverick strengthen market position with strategic merger
summary: The combined entity will have a portfolio of more than 50 properties and an expanded geographic reach.
